name: Help the Cats
description:
Here are some cute hand-drawn cats that need your help. You can help by finding hidden things around you. Guess the cats' clues to lift the tablecloth, search through the mouse hole, and open the door.


You can complete the Cat's Help mission by clicking on the hidden item. Complete the cat's 'help missions' to unlock the next stage.


If you open the tomb incorrectly, you may be in for a surprise!
